quotes.quote: You can't find any true closeness in Hollywood, because everybody does the fake closeness so well.
quotes.author: Carrie Fisher

quotes.quote: Hollywood is a place where people from Iowa mistake each other for stars.
quotes.author: Fred Allen

quotes.quote: You can take all the sincerity in Hollywood, place it in the navel of a firefly and still have room enough for three caraway seeds and a producer's heart.
quotes.author: Fred Allen

quotes.quote: After two years in Washington, I often long for the realism and sincerity of Hollywood.
quotes.author: Fred Thompson

quotes.quote: Hollywood is a place where they'll pay you a thousand dollars for a kiss and fifty cents for your soul.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: Behind the phony tinsel of Hollywood lies the real tinsel.
quotes.author: Oscar Levant

quotes.quote: In Hollywood a marriage is a success if it outlasts milk.
quotes.author: Rita Rudner

quotes.quote: Hollywood is a place where they place you under contract instead of under observation.
quotes.author: Walter Winchell
